pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-5627:Add 'namespaces' to mapping step when xml docs are opened
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Add 'namespaces' to mapping step when xml docs are opened. No additional tests needed as we don't immediately save the updated mapping but wait for users to edit the mapping before saving it
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


[n/a ] Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

commit.message: DHFPROD-5627:Add 'namespaces' to mapping step when xml docs are opened

nodes.bodyText: @xnikhil08  @srinathgit  Does this support many namespaces in the source document? It looks like fetchSrcDocFromUri is parsing the value of "@xmlns"?? This really seems like something the backend should be doing. If this is just preserving QS functionality, I suppose it's fine for now. But can you create a ticket to rework this so that the backend does this properly, which include support namespaces at multiple levels of the document?
nodes.diffHunk:
